description:
## Features
* Cross-platform file tagging, annotation and finding
* Note taking and information management
* Browse folders and preview your files in one application
* Easy File Tagging
* Tag Groups and Colors
* Desktop Search
* Go Paperless
* File and Folder Management
* Go further with extensions
summary: TagSpaces is an offline, open source, personal data manager.It helps you organize files on your Windows, Linux, Android or Mac.
author: TagSpaces UG
